ID: C1Y8T5W_00
From: Information Security <Information.Security@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-10-28 16:07
Subject: Introducing Mimecast - Our New Advanced Email Security Solution
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Colleague,

 

We are pleased to announce that we have implemented Mimecast, an advanced email security solution, to strengthen protection against email cyber threats such as phishing, ransomware and malware.  

 

This upgrade aligns with our new Information Security policies on OneChalhoub <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fdocument-centre%3Fsource%3D1887%26sort%3DupdateDate%26dir%3Ddesc%26mode%3Dgrid%26ref%3Dcontextual_parentID--Equals--58733--Information%2520Security%2520Policies&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C4bbc820d569b426caba608dcf7491bbc%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638657140599910303%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=%2Fvf6sIK9etKdN173ArpfRPZMD4zO6YmmqcDE%2Fo2otUc%3D&reserved=0>  and demonstrates our continued commitment to protecting our systems and ensuring the privacy and security of information assets across the Group. 

Mimecast will run seamlessly in the background to filter malicious emails and enhance security, there will be notifications that require your attention and action:

metadata.doc_id: C1Y8T5W - introducing mimecast - our new advanced email security solution\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
Mimecast will run seamlessly in the background to filter malicious emails and enhance security, there will be notifications that require your attention and action: 

*	New email subject line tags to alert you of potential SPAM or SUSPICIOUS emails. 
*	Email links changed to Mimecast URLs so Mimecast can check for malicious content. 
*	Mimecast notifications of blocked emails due to suspected malicious content or sender. 

 

For detailed information on what to anticipate and how to manage these changes, please refer to the following link: Understanding Mimecast Notification : OneReach (freshservice.com) <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fchalhoubgroup-servicedesk.freshservice.com%2Fsupport%2Fsolutions%2Farticles%2F52000111575&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C4bbc820d569b426caba608dcf7491bbc%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638657140599958029%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=W1NOKyVcRXvzLFm73Z6CsaJRsWpNAhfmmXFmwMtXKek%3D&reserved=0> 

 

If you encounter any issues during this transition, you can easily raise a request here: Mimecast Support Request <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonereach.chalhoub.com%2Fa%2Fcatalog%2Frequest-items%2F492&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C4bbc820d569b426caba608dcf7491bbc%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638657140599988203%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=2qvtCmTosi6Wv260ZAv0SaQg2ZW15idHox3NuG%2BrBTk%3D&reserved=0> , and we will review it and provide assistance.
